cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)
set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE on)

file(GLOB reactnativejni_SRC CONFIGURE_DEPENDS *.cpp)

add_compile_options(
        -fexceptions
        -Wno-unused-lambda-capture
        -std=c++20)

######################
### reactnativejni ###
######################

        reactnativejni
        OBJECT
        ${reactnativejni_SRC}
)
target_merge_so(reactnativejni)

        reactnativejni
        SHARED
        ${reactnativejni_SRC}
)
